pullrequest.title: Resubmit the mixtures of Gaussians code

content.raw:
Upon inspection, I did a couple things different from you that might be the difference between it running or not. Overall, however, the structure is more or less the same. 

I've created a [new branch](https://bitbucket.org/Shiqi_Zou/segway-mixture-resubmit/commits/branch/multiple-genomedata) containing my code. Please let me know if you think anything is incorrect.
